DOC.brief_summary: In this randomized, prospective clinical trial, patients with trigger finger or trigger thumb, will be treated with two different methods; ultrasound-guided release of the first annular pulley or open surgical release of A1 pulley. Results will be compared regarding functional, clinical and cosmetic outcome.
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound Guided A1 Pulley Release For The Treatment of Trigger Finger
DOC.criteria: Patients with resistant after conservative treatment trigger finger or trigger thumb, suffering at least for 3 months. Patients under 18 years old, these who were treated with a previous operation or a corticosteroid injection for their disease and those who were suffering by inflammatory arthritis, tumor or autoimmune disease. Patients with multiple trigger fingers
